title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync error when overwriting exported jar
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jarfile for the second time.
OB: After exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), when overwriting the exported jarfile for the second time, an out of sync message is displayed.
EB: The out of sync message should not be displayed when overwriting the exported jarfile for the second time.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Export a directory (project) as a jar file. 
2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project). 
3. Overwrite the exported jar file for the second time. 
4. Observe the out of sync message being displayed.
